description:
Groovy is known as super-set of java and its has provided scripting feature to java and more over it has provided the features like other scripting language like perl,ruby, python and its integration is seamless with java and this has provided a gateway to java programmer to groom themselves quit easily.

Groovy has many features those normally intends any programmer to learn it and this is must learn kind of programming language since its syntax is quit similar to java. So it is beneficial to all java programmer because their most of code in java could directly be used in groovy but those who are not familiar with java can learn a very dynamic language which helps in automating many day to day work quite easy and removes boiler plate code from java and also helps in removing the verbose from programming language like java.

This course would help you toÂ 

- Become a good automation engineer by writing good script in SOAPUI

- It can help you to handle any files quite easily

- Learn to a language that removes complexity of Java Language

So good luck !!
title: Learn groovy programming basics
